description:
The Supreme Court is facing a legitimacy crisis, with over half of Americans disapproving of the way it’s handling its job. What caused this decline, and can reforms restore its credibility?

00:00 - Introduction
00:20 - Half Of Americans Disapprove Of The Supreme Court
00:53 - Establishment Of The Supreme Court In The US Constitution
01:06 - Why The Supreme Court Has Nine Justices 
01:10 - Why Nominations Are More Polarized 
01:40 - The Impact Of Overturning Roe v. Wade 
01:54 - Investigating Ethics Issues Around Justice Clarence Thomas, His wife Ginni Thomas, And Billionaire Harlan Crow
02:40 - The Controversy Around Justice Samuel Alito And Jan. 6 
03:10 - The Complicated Process Of Impeaching A Supreme Court Justice 
03:38 - Joe Biden’s Proposal To Reform The Supreme Court 
04:12 - Senator Ron Wyden’s Proposed Supreme Court Reforms 
04:38 - The Supreme Court's Conservative Majority
05:12 - Credits

------------------------------------------------------

Business Insider tells you
title: Is It Time To Change The Supreme Court And Can It Happen? | Business Insider Explains
